articles.author: Ashima Grover
articles.title: Rihanna makes a bold statement after facing criticism for ‘lacklustre’ show - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rihanna re-emerges after being slandered for a ‘lazy’ performance at the pre-wedding bash of Asia's richest man's son. Her bold response proves she's over it.
articles.content: Rihanna made a splashing comeback to the stage when she came out of her semi-retirement shell earlier this week to perform at an Indian wedding bash. She allegedly received a whopping fee of $6.3 mil… [+2172 chars]

articles.title: Red Sea cables have been damaged, disrupting global internet traffic - Saudi Gazette
articles.description: Damage to undersea cables in the Red Sea is disrupting global telecommunications networks and forcing internet providers to reroute as much as a quarter of traffic between Asia, Europe and the Middle East.
articles.content: LONDON Damage to undersea cables in the Red Sea is disrupting global telecommunications networks and forcing internet providers to reroute as much as a quarter of traffic between Asia, Europe and the… [+1362 chars]
